Latest reviews from Citysearch . ★☆☆☆☆ Rude Dealership by Chad4578 at Citysearch 1 Mid City Nissan March 25, 2009 The people here are atrocious. The charge you and arm and leg and treat you like you just placed an order at a fast food restaurant. Had my car serviced here recently and when I took my car home none of the issues I had asked to be done had been completed. Their service manager than tried placing the blame on me when I had clearly detailed the problem to his associate - talk about poor customer service. Go somewhere else where they won't rip you off and they appreciate your business.
